title: Zoe Skin: Snoe/Winter WonderLand Zoe
body: Zoe as an Icicle/Snowman with the Aurora borealis as her hair. The amulet would be the magic cap and as she backs it flies off and away as your body melts.

replies.body:
heres an idea: give skins to champs who havent got a new skin in over a 1000 days...

Zoe just got one
